Name: Clan Smoke Jaguar
Details: Clan Smoke Jaguar was one of the original 20 Clans founded by Nicholas Kerensky following the Second Exodus and was one of seven Clans selected for the Clan Invasion of the Inner Sphere. Known for their incredible aggression and lack of foresight Clan Smoke Jaguar was chosen as the target of Operation BULLDOG, where the Second Star League first drove them from their Inner Sphere holdings and then pursued them back to the Clan Homeworlds and eradicated the entire Clan, wiping Smoke Jaguar out completely.
